name: Barrelrun
overview:
Barrelrun is the first wine site and application to fully connect wineries with wine adventurers! Their initial focus is California with new wineries and wines being added daily.

Wineries are given full control over all their critical data. The winery-friendly dashboard allows wineries to accurately maintain wine inventory, easily publish events, quickly create specials, and more, all in real-time.

The site’s GPS based map makes it effortless for wine adventurers to determine nearby wineries. They can then make virtual visits, comment/rate on everything a winery publishes, save favorites, and get access to real-time deals.

Along the way, coming to feel the culture of each winery and in turn, a better understanding of why they produce the wines they do and not the other way around.

This dynamic interaction produces multi-dimensional data that wineries can use to make changes for the better to ensure lasting relationships.
